webfonts-menu-tooltip: Select a font for the page
webfonts-preview-intro: This page helps you to preview the fonts available in the WebFonts extension and optionally download and install in your computer.
webfonts-preview-sampletext: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
webfonts-preview-installing-fonts-text: You can download a font using the "{{int:webfonts-preview-download}}" link given above. To install the downloaded font on your computer, please see [//www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:How_to_install_fonts this documentation].
